00235 inline uint32 
00236 CoordinateOnItemObject::getNbrItems() const {
00237    return m_inputs.size();
00238 }
00239 
00240 
00241 inline bool 
00242 CoordinateOnItemObject::requestDone() const {
00243    return ( m_state == DONE || m_state == ERROR );
00244 }
00245 
00246 
00247 inline bool
00248 CoordinateOnItemObject::finnishedOk() const {
00249    return ( m_state == DONE );
00250 }

00252 
00253 inline void 
00254 CoordinateOnItemObject::getResult( uint32 index, 
00255                                    uint32& mapID, 
00256                                    uint32& itemID,
00257                                    uint16& offset, 
00258                                    int32& lat, int32& lon, 
00259                                    bool& hasLat ) const
00260 {
00261    mapID = m_inputs[ index ].m_mapID;
00262    itemID = m_inputs[ index ].m_itemID;
00263    offset = m_inputs[ index ].m_offset;
00264    lat = m_inputs[ index ].m_lat;
00265    lon = m_inputs[ index ].m_lon;
00266    hasLat = m_inputs[ index ].m_hasLat;
00267 }
00268 
00269 
00270 inline void 
00271 CoordinateOnItemObject::getResultWithBoundingbox( 
00272    uint32 index, uint32& mapID, uint32& itemID,
00273    uint16& offset, int32& lat, int32& lon, bool& hasLat,
00274    MC2BoundingBox& bbox ) const
00275 {
00276    getResult( index, mapID, itemID, offset, lat, lon, hasLat );
00277    if ( m_bboxWanted ) {
00278       bbox = m_inputs[ index ].m_bbox;
00279    }
00280 }
